name: Down Deep (The Shallow Between)
description:
Your master has tasked you with traversing foreign planes in search of something. He says you will know it when you find it. You will see many wondrous and terrible things. However, above all else, you must remember:

This is a punishment.

NOTE: Only ONE BRANCH is finished in this version; the SYLVAN SCROLL is the only item that will allow you to continue. All paths within this branch are finished.

What's here is barely more than a first draft and still needs a lot of work, but I hope you enjoy it. It's taken me a year to get to this point.

Please feel free to contact me with what you like/dislike, if anything is broken, any suggestions you have, etc.
